publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-1375 John Swinney: Draft Official Statistics (Scotland) Order 2008—That the Economy, Energy and Tourism Committee recommends that the draft Official Statistics (Scotland) Order 2008 be approved. Supported by: Jim Mather* Motions and amendments which have attracted additional support
